snippet: A community college president and a congresswoman are critical of for-profit colleges.
abstract: Rep Janice Hahn of California responds to July 9 editorial calling for stronger regulation of for-profit colleges in wake of Corinthian Colleges collapse.
lead_paragraph: A community college president and a congresswoman are critical of for-profit colleges.

headline.main: For-Profit Colleges, Supported by Taxpayer Dollars
headline.print_headline: For-Profit Colleges, Supported by Taxpayer Dollars
